data.eml:eml: The sparid fishes of Pakistan, with new distribution records

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Siddiqui, Pirzada Jamal, Amir, Shabir Ali, Masroor, Rafaqat (2014): The sparid fishes of Pakistan, with new distribution records. Zootaxa 3857 (1): 71-100, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3857.1.3
